text:
I ordered an Old Cuban/ In the whitest of towns./ Sure,/ It’s progressive./ Sure,/ You can smoke weed every second/ On a sidewalk/ That leads straight to/ Banks and the bay./

But try some time to/ Speak as you’re supposed to/ Lips set in Spanish tones./ Greet the blank but smiling/ Faces./ And remember they don’t give/ A fuck either./ They’ll wash you away/ With a wave/ And a couple of nods./
